descriptionHtml:
Rorikstead House

1.3 Update

- Weapon Grind
- Map with flags
- Kind of light saber on the throne
- Fixed some light glitches.
- Darker
- some baskets and ingredients
- Max (The dog),learned to walk :D


---------------------------------------------------

1.2

New TRAINING area in basement
A Dog in the house

----------------------------------------------------
 1.1

Fixed Duplicated NPC\'S
Fog added to basement
King-size bed
Workbench
and some other little stuffs.

-----------------------------------------------------


This mod add\'s a new house in Rorikstead, with a basemenet.
There are a lot of stuffs.

Workbench
Alchemy Table
Enchanting Table
Forge
Smelting
Mannequins
Beds
Weapons Rack
Weapons Display

This is my first Mod with Creation Kit
Hope you like it

Troubleshoot

Q) My Mannequins are ALIVE!
A: Activate all of them, Save the game, Exit Skyrim, Enter Skyrim. Should be OK

Q) Is this compatible with all mods?
A: It should be, at least it should work with any mod that doesn\'t modify the terrain or the area where the house is.

If you find a bug please repot it, by sending a comment or email me

gabrielpin70@hotmail.com


Hope you like it :)


Install

Copy file to your data folder and enable it in Data files on Launcher.
author: pinto123412341234
